fields.category_description: Philosophy is designed with the ultimate goal of offering a safe, comfortable and enjoyable event for every patron.

fields.position_description: Responsible for maintaining orderly flow and assisting patrons throughout the facility during events.
Responsible for the selling of tickets in advance and on the day of events.
Responsible for helping management enforce facility policies to ensure patrons are afforded a safe and enjoyable environment during events.
Responsible for direction of traffic flow in and out of parking areas during events.
Responsible for preparing and selling food & drink to patrons during events and working with in-house catering department.

fields.category_description: Responsible for event production setup and teardown.

fields.position_description: Responsible for the loading and unloading of equipment before and after an event. Will provide assistance for stage set-up, lighting, sound & props. Responsible for set changes during a show.
Responsible for operating xenon super-trouper spotlights for arena events.
Responsible for operating sound, lighting, video boards, and camera systems.
Responsible for working in the ceiling steel beams with show personnel. To secure suspended production equipment for events.
Responsible for laying out rigging equipment, connecting materials from the ground to be used by Up Riggers.

fields.category_description: Temporary part-time staff and operations crew.

fields.position_description: Work with full-time operations staff for facility set-up, tear down, and clean-up of all events.
